name: Project Hero or Foe
description:
This game requires at least 2 people or more to play.

LAN / Remote Local play is recommended at this stage.

*Online mode on Steam could bump into other Servers creates by other developers. Please join your friends' session by using the Steam Friend panel.

English is available in the game, please scroll down to the bottom setting to change the language.

Thank you for trying!
Please leave your feedback at the discussion board!

※This is a work of fiction. Names, characters, business, events, and incidents are the products of the author’s imagination. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental. Doujin characters included.
